MS MCQs

    Access Dataverse in Power Apps portals

    »

    1. Which one of the following options is not a valid entity list view?

      Map view

      Excel view

      Calendar view

      Grid list view


    2. You have created a Contact Us entity form and want to redirect users to a Thank You page after successful submission. How can you achieve this task?

      Change the entity form title to “Contact Us - Thank You.”

      Set the Entity Form field on the Thank You page to the Contact Us entity form.

      Add a redirect step to the entity form.

      Configure On Success Settings to redirect to the Thank You page.


    3. Where in Power Apps portals Studio would you add a list and form component to a particular webpage?

      From the Properties pane of a webpage

      Edit the page template source code

      From the tool belt components section

      You can only add forms and lists by using the Portal Management app


    4. You want portal visitors to be able to locate specific records in a list view based on an option value in the Microsoft Dataverse record. What is the best way to accomplish this task?

      Enable the search property on the list component in portals Studio.

      Add the Option Set field to the model-driven view to allow portal visitors to sort by the value.

      In the Portal Management app, enable Metadata searching and configure a filter for the Option Set field.

      In portals Studio, increase the number of records for each page.
